title: 11/18/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 11/18/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP previews the NBA Draft tonight. What are the comps for some of the top players in this year's class? Where does he think LaMelo Ball would fit best? We're joined by Sports Illustrated's Chris Mannix, Pro Football Talk Co-host Mike Florio, and University of Indiana's Head Football Coach, Tom Allen. Plus, should teams be concerned about what Anthony Edwards has said? DP doesn't think so.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP previews the NBA Draft tonight. What are the comps for some of the top players in this year's class? Where does he think LaMelo Ball would fit best? We're joined by Sports Illustrated's Chris Mannix, Pro Football Talk Co-host Mike Florio, and University of Indiana's Head Football Coach, Tom Allen. Plus, should teams be concerned about what Anthony Edwards has said? DP doesn't think so.
